name: Guard Dog (or young Jaguar, Boar, etc.)
description: A dog or other similar-sized animal that underwent basic training to fight and protect its owner. Can be trained as a tame animal companion, provided you have the Survival talent with the same name.

name: Draft Horse (or Donkey, Mule)
description: A largely untrained horse, fit to pull a vehicle but not to be ridden. See under Creatures to see its statistics.

name: Antitoxin
description: As an action, drink this liquid to cure you of one source of poison affecting you.

name: Acid Vial
description: Counts as a thrown weapon (bundle, thrown (short)) dealing +3 acid damage as weapon damage.

name: Flammable Paste
description:
Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use as an Action to apply the paste to any weapon or one type of ammo supply. The paste holds onto the surface it is applied to for a medium duration. During that time, the paste can be instantly ignited by any flame without effort.
Once ignited and when you hit with the coated weapon or ammo, you also deal 2 fire damage (ignoring AV) to the target. The ignited paste lasts for a short duration.

name: Paralyzing Poison (weak)
description:
Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to coat one weapon or one type of ammo supply in poison. The poison coat lasts for a short duration.
When you hit with the coated weapon or ammo, the target is poisoned for a short duration. They can roll Strength + Fortitude at the end of their turns to end the effect early. If they succeed, they are also immune against this poison’s effects for the rest of the scene.

name: Weapon Poison (weak)
description:
Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to coat one weapon or one type of ammo supply in poison. The poison coat lasts for a short duration.
When you hit with the coated weapon or ammo, you also deal 2 poison damage (ignoring AV) to the target.

name: Fire Bomb
description: Counts as a thrown weapon (bundle, thrown (short)) dealing +3 fire damage as weapon damage. Damage is applied to all creatures in melee range of the target.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Counts as a thrown weapon (bundle, thrown (short)). Erupts in a cloud of smoke lasting a short duration in a close range of the point of impact. The smoke counts as an area with dim light.

name: Heightening Potion
description: As an Action or by skipping all Movement this turn, you can drink this potion to gain +1 Movement per turn and +1 boon on all attack rolls for a short duration. After this effect ends, roll Strength + Fortitude. On a failure, you suffer one Fatigue. On a blunder, you suffer two Fatigue instead.

name: Potion of Healing (weak)
description: As an Action or by skipping all Movement this turn, you can drink this potion to regain 8 HP.

name: Paralyzing Poison (decent)
description:
Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to coat one weapon or one type of ammo supply in poison. The poison coat lasts for a short duration.
When you hit with the coated weapon or ammo, the target is poisoned and staggered for a short duration. They can roll a hard Strength + Fortitude test at the end of their turns to end the effect early. If they succeed, they are also immune against this poison’s effects for the rest of the scene.

name: Weapon Poison (decent)
description:
Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to coat one weapon or one type of ammo supply in poison. The poison coat lasts for a short duration.
When you hit with the coated weapon or ammo, you also deal 4 poison damage (ignoring AV) to the target.

name: Potion of Healing (decent)
description: Drink this potion as an Action to regain 16 HP.

name: Weapon Poison (strong)
description:
Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to coat one weapon or one type of ammo supply in poison. The poison coat lasts for a short duration.
When you hit with the coated weapon or ammo, you also deal 6 poison damage (ignoring AV) to the target.

name: Paralyzing Poison (strong)
description:
Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to coat one weapon or one type of ammo supply in poison. The poison coat lasts for a short duration.
When you hit with the coated weapon or ammo, the target is poisoned and stunned for a short duration. They can roll a very hard Strength + Fortitude test at the end of their turns to end the effect early. If they succeed, they are also immune to this poison’s effects for the rest of the scene.

name: Potion of Healing (strong)
description: Drink this potion as an Action to regain 24 HP.

name: Simple Clothes
description: Simple, functional clothes.

name: Traveler‘s Clothes
description: Sturdy clothes made for harsh weather and long journeys.

name: Fine Clothes
description: Clothes of a noble or wealthy merchant made from high quality materials.

name: Extravagant Clothes
description: Clothes worthy of a king or queen made from the most exotic materials.

name: Pouch
description: A simple pouch to be carried around by hand or on a belt. Can hold up to 2 load.

name: Linen Bag
description: A rough bag of linen made to hold wheat, fruits, or other items. Can hold up to 5 load.

name: Backpack
description: A simple backpack or satchel. Can hold up to 10 load.

name: Wooden Chest
description: A wooden container for storing small to medium sized objects. Can hold up to 50 load.

name: Traveler’s Backpack
description: A sturdy backpack for longer periods of travel. Can hold up to 15 load.

name: Reinforced Chest
description: A chest reinforced with strips of bronze, brass, or lead. Can hold up to 100 load.

name: Explorer’s Backpack
description: A high-quality backpack made to resist the longest journeys. Can hold up to 20 load.

name: Rope (Hemp)
description: Covers a medium distance. Can be split up into multiple more fragile strings.

name: Shovel
description: You can dig a hole with it!

name: Wineskin
description: Intoxicates on frequent consumption. Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to be intoxicated for 1 hour. While being intoxicated, you are poisoned.

name: Oil Flask
description:
Worth one unit of light for a lantern.
You can also empty one unit of oil to cover a close area in oil, turning it into difficult terrain.

name: Pickaxe
description: Used for mining rock and minerals.

name: Portable Ram
description: Roll Strength + Athletics with this ram to force a door open - very loudly.

name: Camping Kit
description: Contains a tent, tent pegs, a tinder box, and a bedroll. Provides shelter for a night‘s rest for up to two people.

name: Crafting Kit
description: Contains a sturdy leather tool pouch with various crafting implements: a hammer, nails, a set of chisels, a small saw, a measuring tape, and a whetstone. Using the kit, you can attempt to repair a damaged item during a night's rest. Roll Agility/Mind + Crafting against 5 + the item’s Quality as the difficulty and make a Supply check for materials. On a success, the item is no longer damaged.

name: Lantern
description: Requires oil to be used as a source of light. Emits bright light in close range and dim light in medium range when lit. Can be dimmed (only dim light in close distance). The lantern is not considered as Supply.

name: Rope (Silk)
description: Covers a long distance. More delicate than hemp without suffering in strength.

name: Alchemist‘s Supplies
description: Contains glass beakers with a metal frame, a glass stirring rod, a small mortar and pestle, a pouch of common alchemical ingredients. Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use instead of making a Supply check for materials when crafting some medicinal or alchemical substance.

name: Arcane Conduit
description: A small hand-hold object infused by an elemental gem or similar arcane conduit. Can also be combined with another hand-held item (weapon, shield, …). Can be used as a spell focus to cast arcane spells.

name: Bundle of Maps
description: Contains several maps for a specific region. Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to consult the maps and gain +1 boon on a Nature roll.

name: Bundle of Scrolls
description: Contains several scrolls with valuable knowledge about a topic, such as local politics, medicine, or the history of a region. Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use to consult the scrolls and gain +1 boon on a roll with either Education, Lore, or Nature.

name: Healer‘s Kit
description:
Contains powders, bandages, a mortar and pestle, and clippers to collect plants.
Has 5 uses. Spend 1 use when you attempt to treat a Wound. You don’t have to make a Supply check for your materials and you automatically succeed on the roll.

name: Mystic Talisman
description: A small hand-hold object holding a mystical artifact, or similar object radiating mystical power. Can also be combined with another hand-held item (weapon, shield, …). Can be used as a spell focus to cast mystical spells.

name: Thieves‘ Tools
description: Contains a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Has 5 uses. Each time you blunder a roll to pick a lock, spend 1 use.

name: Kestros Darts
description: Worth one unit of ammo for kestros.

name: Throwing Stones
description: Worth one unit of ammo for slings and slingshots.

name: Blowdarts
description: Worth one unit of ammo for blowpipes.

name: Primitive Materials
description: Worth one unit of materials (Quality 1).

name: Provisions
description: Worth one unit of provisions.

name: Torch
description: Worth one unit of light. Emit bright light in close range and dim light in short range when lit. You can also use a lit torch as an improvised weapon dealing 2 fire damage.

name: Arrows
description: Worth one unit of ammo for bows. Comes with a quiver.

name: Bolts
description: Worth one unit of ammo for crossbows. Comes with a bolt case.

name: Simple Materials
description: Worth one unit of materials (Quality 2).

name: Advanced Materials
description: Worth one unit of materials (Quality 3).

name: Adventuring Gear
description: Contains a crowbar, a hammer, a shovel, chalk, a wooden pole, and spikes.

name: Brewer‘s Tools
description: Contains a large glass jug, a quantity of hops, a siphon, and several feet of tubing.

name: Carpenter‘ Tools
description: Contains a saw, a hammer, nails, a hatchet, a square, a ruler, an adze, a plane, and a chisel.

name: Climber‘s Kit
description: Contains pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness.

name: Cook‘s Utensils
description: Contains a metal pot, knives, forks, a stirring spoon, and a ladle.

name: Disguise Kit
description: Contains cosmetics, hair dye, small props, and a few different pieces of clothing.

name: Gaming Set
description: Contains all the pieces to play a specific game, such as a board, cards, dice, or tokens.

name: Leatherworker‘s Tools
description: Contains a knife, a small mallet, an edger, a hole punch, thread, and leather scraps.

name: Mason‘s Tools
description: Contains a small trowel, a hammer, a chisel, brushes, and a square.

name: Navigator‘s Tools
description: Contains a sextant, a compass, calipers, a ruler, parchment, ink, and a quill.

name: Painter‘s Supplies
description: Contains an easel, canvas, brushes, charcoal sticks, and a palette.

name: Smith‘s Tools
description: Contains hammers, tongs, charcoal, rags, and a whetstone.

name: Weaver‘s Tools
description: Contains thread, needles, and scraps of cloth.

name: Woodcarver‘s Tools
description: Contains a knife, a gourge, and a small saw.

name: Jeweler‘s Tools
description: Contains a small saw, hammer, files, pliers, tweezers, and a small magnifying glass.

name: Musical Instrument
description: Any common type of string, woodwind, brass, or percussion instrument. Examples include a harp, lire, or cithara for stringed instruments. A flute, pan pipes, or clarinet for woodwind instruments. A horn, trumpet, or tuba for brass instruments. Or lastly hand drums, a tambourine, or macaras for percussion instruments.

name: Small Trinket
description: Any type of simple but rare item that has some aesthetic, or sentimental value, such as a carved figurine, a silver ring, a glass vial, a brass compass, a leather pouch, a dried flower, a crystal pendant, a feather quill, a ceramic mask, or a wooden flute.

name: Untitled
description: Any type of simple but rare item that has some aesthetic, or sentimental value, such as a carved figurine, a silver ring, a glass vial, a brass compass, a leather pouch, a dried flower, a crystal pendant, a feather quill, a ceramic mask, or a wooden flute.

name: Cart
description: A small two-wheeled wooden cart holding up to 200 load or up to four medium creatures. Can be drawn by a person or mount.

name: Chariot
description: A wooden chariot for one or two people to stand in. Requires a mount to pull the chariot.
